Articles.Content:
Ok so i got a pretty hard challenge you need to first go to moho and then to elloo !

Easy:Go to moho and Elloo

Medium: Go to Elloo and Moho whitout mining or refueling

Hard: Go to Elloo and Moho whit the same lander !!

OMG : Impress me !!!!
Take a look at the challenge submission guide. This challenge (at least in my opinion) needs a bit of revision
